title: Unsecured FTP Access
description: Explore how unsecured FTP servers can be accessed and exploited to retrieve sensitive information.
hints: Anonymous FTP access means you don't need a password. Just use 'ftp victim'.
Check for files that might not be immediately visible.
Remember, FTP might hide files that are not visible through normal directory listings.
learningObjectives: Understand how FTP servers can be misconfigured to allow unintended access.
Learn to navigate and retrieve files from an FTP server.
Recognize the importance of securing FTP servers.
